alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Letcher; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:21PM EDT until June 17 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harlan County in southeastern Kentucky... Letcher County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Perry County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 121 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lilley Cornett Woods, or 9 miles west of Whitesburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Flint around 125 PM EDT. Oscaloosa around 130 PM EDT. Whitesburg around 135 PM EDT. Eolia around 140 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
